A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I came to this movie with low expectations\, but was disappointed nevertheless.  I didn't expect brilliant sci fi\, but I was hoping for a little originality\, a little imagination.  I guess they played it safe\, rehashing old tropes\, old thrills\, set to old music.  \n\nThis movie has made over $100 million so far.  So it's a success as far as the Disney Corporation is concerned.  Who cares if it lacks originality or imagination\, let alone artistic or social relevance?
